name: Color Snooker
description:
Color Snooker is a softcore puzzle pool game that takes you through 20 different stages and asks you to hit all the paint buckets on your way to the goal.

WHAT MAKES LEVELS CHALLENGING

There are many many obstructions and traps on your way to the goal. For example - loop holes that will eat your ball and your level will be lost, walls and lasers that will block you from hitting the goal.

Another thing to consider is that before hitting the goal, you must hit all the paint bricks and release the paint inside them which will leave you with a cool color trail.

Plan, calculate and execute. Be careful and smart.
